steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the 'Insert' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Text' group, click on the 'Text Box' button and select 'Simple Text Box'.
Click and drag on the document to create a text box.
Type the content of the certificate inside the text box.
Format the text and add any desired styling.
Click on the 'File' tab in the ribbon.
Select 'Save As' to save the certificate with a desired name and location.
